input_text:
Job Title: Office Administrator

Location: Atlanta, GA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Administrative, Customer Service

Description:
Office and Career Services Administrator
The Stepping Stones Group- 2300 Windy Ridge Parkway SE, Atlanta, GA

The Stepping Stones Group is transforming the lives of children, families, and communities together through our exceptional therapeutic and behavioral health services. 
We believe our Core Values embody the culture of our organization: Trust, Integrity, Results, Quality, Community, and Inclusivity.
Objectives of this role:Ensure general office coordination of office with effective communications and planning.Contribute to company goals while maintaining our company values, positive employee experience.
Responsibilities:Coordinate office activities and operations while providing clerical, administrative, and production support to management, such as:Source candidate or client leads as requested.Review and approve field employee timecards.Package and prepare deliveries of marketing items for company events.Sort and distribute incoming mail.Greet office visitors, answer and direct phone calls.Generate/ distribute memos, letters, spreadsheets, forms.Maintain and update assigned reports, documents, and files.
Manage general office administration tasks such as:Order office supplies and track inventory for upcoming or changing needs.Issue and maintain building access cards and keys to office.Arrange office repairs or services with building management.Serve as primary liaison between company staff and building managers, providing information, answering questions, and responding to requests.
Manage general meeting and event activities including:Schedule and track company meeting and appointmentsReserve conference rooms for both on-site and off-site events.Manage various food orders and event reservations.Book travel arrangements and logistics for incoming guests as needed
Qualifications:
Adaptability and flexibility to support any unexpected changes, providing a seamless employee or guest experience within the office environment as well as any company meetings or events.Detail-oriented, strategic thinking & independent problem solving.Thorough planning and implementation skillsExcellent written and verbal communicationEnthusiastic attitude and a supportive collaboratorExceptional time management and multi-tasking/ prioritizationProficiency with Microsoft Office applications and aptitude for learning new software and systems.Ability to maintain confidentiality of company information.Bachelor’s or associate degree preferred.
This position is full-time, hourly at our Atlanta office location.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Office Administrator
output_json.summary: Office and Career Services Administrator at The Stepping Stones Group in Atlanta, GA.
optional_skills: Aptitude for learning new software and systems
job_responsibilities: Provide clerical, administrative, and production support to management
Review and approve field employee timecards
Package and prepare deliveries of marketing items
Greet office visitors and answer phone calls
Generate and distribute memos, letters, spreadsheets, forms
Maintain and update reports, documents, and files
Order office supplies and track inventory
Issue and maintain building access cards and keys
Serve as primary liaison between company staff and building managers
Schedule and track company meetings and appointments
Manage various food orders and event reservations
Book travel arrangements and logistics for guests
output_json.company_information: The Stepping Stones Group is transforming the lives of children, families, and communities together through our exceptional therapeutic and behavioral health services. We believe our Core Values embody the culture of our organization: Trust, Integrity, Results, Quality, Community, and Inclusivity.
